subject: Sports Medicine
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang was placed on the disabled list for weakness in the abductors of both hips — a direct result, of the torn Lisfranc ligament he sustained in his right foot last June.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang was placed on the disabled list for weakness in the abductors of both hips — a direct result, of the torn Lisfranc ligament he sustained in his right foot last June.
